TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件使你可以 在详细信息视图中自定义 (或所有者描述) 控件的外观。The event enables you to customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a control in the details view. 当控件的 属性设置为 `true` 并且其 属性设置为时，控件将引发该事件 。The event is raised by a control when its property is set to `true` and its property is set to . 传递给事件处理程序的包含有关要绘制的的信息 ，还提供可帮助您绘制子项的方法。The passed to the event handler contains information about the to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the subitem. 使用 或 属性检索有关要绘制的子项的父项的信息。Use the or properties to retrieve information about the parent item of the subitem to draw. 若要检索 自身，请使用 属性。To retrieve the itself, use the property. 使用 属性可检索 表示子项的列标题的。Use the property to retrieve the representing the header of the column in which the subitem is displayed. 使用 属性可以在由属性指定的区域内执行实际绘图 。Use the property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the property. 若要绘制 不需要自定义的标准元素，请使用 、 和 方法。To draw standard elements that do not need customization, use the , , and methods. 如果希望操作系统绘制子项，请使用属性。Use the property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem. 如果你只想要自定义特定子项，这会很有用。This is useful when you want to customize only specific subitems. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免在所有者绘制时图形闪烁的问题，请重写 控件并将 属性设置为 `true` 。To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the control and set the property to `true`. 当应用程序调用方法时，此功能仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 家族上可用 。This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为控件提供自定义绘图 。The following code example demonstrates how to provide custom drawing for a control. 该示例中的控件具有渐变背景。The control in the example has a gradient background. 具有负值的子项具有红色的前景和黑色背景。Subitems with negative values have a red foreground and a black background. 事件的处理程序 绘制整个项的背景。A handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 事件的处理程序 绘制文本值以及具有负值的子项的文本和背景。A handler for the event draws the text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 事件的处理程序 绘制每个列标题。A handler for the event draws each column header. 组件提供一种在详细信息视图和列表视图之间切换的方法。A component provides a way to switch between the details view and the list view. 在列表视图中，只 会触发事件。In the list view, only the event is fired. 在这种情况下，会在事件处理程序中绘制文本和背景 。In this case, the text and background are both drawn in the event handler. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的位置相对于控件的左上角 。The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在为控件提供自定义绘图的应用程序中使用属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在此示例中，事件的处理程序 绘制子项文本值以及具有负值的子项的文本和背景。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawBackground() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 的当前背景色绘制它的背景。

span.span: Draws the background of the using its current background color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法绘制使用属性的当前值的标准背景 。Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the property. 绘制背景以填充属性指定的区域 。The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the property. > [!NOTE] > 父项的属性 必须设置为 `false` ，以防止 父项的值重写子项值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在为控件提供自定义绘图的应用程序中使用方法 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在此示例中，事件的处理程序 绘制子项文本值以及具有负值的子项的文本和背景。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应由操作系统绘制而不是由所有者描述 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the should be drawn by the operating system instead of owner-drawn.

value.span: 如果该子项应由操作系统绘制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the subitem should be drawn by the operating system; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为不希望自定义的子项处理事件时，请使用此属性。Use this property when handling the event for subitems that you do not want to customize. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则会使用 、 和 属性的当前值以正常方式绘制子项If you set this property to `true`, the subitem will be drawn normally using the current values of the , , and properties > [!NOTE] > 父项的属性 必须设置为 `false` ，以防止 父项的值重写子项值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ListView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#472](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#472)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#472](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#472)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawFocusRectangle(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds) cil managed

span.span: The area within which to draw the focus rectangle.

summary.span: 如果父级 具有焦点，则为 绘制一个聚焦框。

span.span: Draws a focus rectangle for the if the parent has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可在子项周围绘制标准聚焦框。Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the subitem. 聚焦框在参数指定的区域内绘制一个像素 `bounds` 。The focus rectangle is drawn one pixel inside the area specified by the `bounds` parameter. 仅当父项具有焦点时才绘制，因此在调用此方法之前无需检查项的焦点状态。It is drawn only when the parent item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method. 你可能希望仅围绕第一个子项 (即父项，该父项显示在第一) 列中，而不是围绕项的每个子项进行绘制。You might want to draw the focus rectangle only around the first subitem (that is, the parent item, which is displayed in the first column) rather than drawing it around every subitem of an item. 当 属性设置为时，这对应于控件的正常行为 `false` 。This corresponds to the normal behavior of a control when the property is set to `false`. 若要在第一个子项周围绘制聚焦框，请 仅当该值为0时才调用方法 。To draw the focus rectangle around the first subitem, call the method only when the value is 0. 控件不提供选择各个子项的功能，但如果您要自行实现子项选择，则可以使用此方法来围绕第一个子项绘制聚焦框。The control does not provide the ability to select individual subitems, but if you want to implement subitem selection yourself, you can use this method to draw the focus rectangle around a subitem other than the first one.

summary.span: 使用 的当前前景色和默认格式设置绘制它的文本。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color and the default formatting.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawText() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 的当前前景色绘制它的文本。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以使用和属性的当前值绘制子项文本 。Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the and properties. 文本在属性指定的区域内绘制 。The text is drawn within the area specified by the property. > [!NOTE] > 父项的属性 必须设置为 `false` ，以防止 父项的和 值重写子项值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the and values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawText(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags flags) cil managed

span.span: A bitwise combination of values.

summary.span: 使用 的当前前景色以及由指定的 值设置的格式绘制它的文本。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以使用和属性的当前值绘制子项文本 。Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the and properties. 文本在属性指定的区域内绘制 。The text is drawn within the area specified by the property. 通过 在参数中指定的值 `flags` ，您可以为节点标签提供格式设置属性，如文本对齐。The values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment. > [!NOTE] > 父项的属性 必须设置为 `false` ，以防止 父项的和 值重写子项值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the and values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在为控件提供自定义绘图的应用程序中使用方法 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在此示例中，事件的处理程序 绘制子项文本值以及具有负值的子项的文本和背景。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. summary.span: 获取要绘制的 的父级 。

span.span: Gets the parent of the to draw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可访问 要绘制的的父级 。Use this property to access the parent of the to draw. 当 属性没有提供足够的信息来满足您的需求时，这非常有用。This is useful when the property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs. 属性仅提供可用于确定父项是选中、选中还是聚焦的基本状态信息。The property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused. 另一方面 ，属性允许您访问父级的所有成员 。The property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the parent . 若要访问 正在绘制的，请使用 属性。To access the being drawn, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ListView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. value.span: 值的按位组合，指示父级 的当前状态。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values indicating the current state of the parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性检查 要绘制的的父级是否 处于某个特定状态。Use this property to check whether the parent of the to draw is in a particular state. 此属性仅提供有关父项的基本状态信息。This property provides only basic state information about the parent item. 例如，你可以使用此属性来确定父项是处于选中状态、选中状态还是焦点。You can use this property, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused. 如果需要了解详细信息，请通过属性检索父项 并直接检查其属性。If you need to know more, retrieve the parent item through the property and check its properties directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在为控件提供自定义绘图的应用程序中使用属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在此示例中，事件的处理程序 绘制子项文本值以及具有负值的子项的文本和背景。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SubItem As ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

span.span: Gets the to draw.
The to draw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当其他 属性没有提供足够的信息来满足您的需求时，此方法非常有用。This method is useful when the other properties do not provide adequate information to meet your needs. 属性允许您访问正在绘制的的所有成员 。The property allows you to access all members of the being drawn. 例如，你必须直接访问此对象， 而不是使用方法来绘制值 。You must access this object directly, for example, to draw the value yourself rather than using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在为控件提供自定义绘图的应用程序中使用属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在此示例中，事件的处理程序 绘制子项文本值以及具有负值的子项的文本和背景。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic.
